name: Looming Threat (Ufonek)
description:
Youmu wakes up in the dead of the night and has to traverse Hakugyoukurou to find the loo.
However, Hakugyoukurou is the residence of the dead. What nighttime threats hide in the dark?

Luckily, she has two friends to guide her - Her ghost half Myon to light the way, and her favourite Japanese Goblin plushie. Squeak the goblin to relieve stress and keep yourself sane!
Reach 100 rooms to win!

Controls:

  • WASD/arrow keys - move Youmu
  • Mouse - move Myon
  • Space/Left mouse button - Squeak Goblin (Regain sanity)
  • R - Restart Game
